Container.Overview:
JellyLooter v3.1.0 - Sync media from remote Jellyfin/Emby servers to local storage.
FREE Features: - Browse and download from 2 remote servers - Library search - find movies/shows by name - Duplicate detection with local library scanning - Rating overlays on posters (IMDB/TMDB ratings) - Quality badges (4K, 1080p, HDR, Dolby Vision, Atmos) - Content rating badges (PG-13, R, TV-MA) - Time format option (12-hour or 24-hour) - 30+ timezone options - Mobile-friendly responsive UI with hamburger menu - Download history, search/filter, keyboard shortcuts - Auto-retry failed downloads - Multi-language support (English, Spanish, German)
PRO Features ($10 lifetime): - Unlimited servers and sync mappings - Notifications (Discord, Telegram, 80+ services) - GPU transcoding (NVIDIA NVENC, Intel QuickSync, AMD VAAPI) - Transcoding presets: H.264, H.265/HEVC, AVI, Mobile, 4K Optimized - Transcode cache drive support (use fast SSD) - Download and bandwidth scheduling - *arr integration (Sonarr/Radarr auto-add and folder naming) - Intelligent path mapping auto-detection - Custom themes (Jellyfin, Plex, Emby, Christmas, Custom) - Multiple local servers for duplicate detection - Analytics dashboard
Get Pro: https://lightwave43.gumroad.com/l/rmtmrr
Confirmed working on Unraid 7.0+ / 7.2.2

Config.Name: Storage Path
Config.Description: Path to your media storage (where downloads will be saved)

Config.Name: Cache Path (Pro)
Config.Description: (Pro) Path to cache drive for faster transcoding - download to cache, transcode, then move to array

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Your timezone (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London). Also configurable in UI Settings.

Config.Name: NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
Config.Description: (Pro GPU) Set to 'all' or GPU UUID for NVIDIA transcoding. Also add --runtime=nvidia to Extra Parameters.
